Class BusinessEditorState

java.lang.Object
ch.supsi.business.state.BusinessEditorState
All Implemented Interfaces:
EditorStateManager, EditorState, StateChangeEvent
public class BusinessEditorState extends Object implements EditorStateManager, StateChangeEvent
Manages editor states and notifies listeners of state changes.
